description: A React component for managing operations, supporting listing, filtering, creating, editing, and deleting operations. It interacts with backend APIs and enforces authentication.

methods.name: getProducts
methods.description: Fetches the list of products and updates the state.

methods.name: getOperations
methods.description: Fetches the list of operations, optionally filtered by productId.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves a new or updated operation to the backend.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Prepares the form for editing an existing operation.
